text:
@SenatorLankford It is unbelievable that Republicans would try to bail out corporations. - Now Senate Republicans are holding hostage critical support to combat the COVID19 pandemic for more corporate demands. We need to get aid moving quickly to the hard working American people. 

Fixed it!
